title.rendered: Reasons to opt for NMIMS Distance MBA Learning

content.rendered:
Narsee Monjee Institute Of Management Studies (NMIMS) – Narsee Monjee Institute Of Management Studies (NMIMS) – Narsee Monjee Institute Of Various certificate, diploma, and Distance Management courses are available through distance learning.

NMIMS’ remote learning courses are unquestionably among the most popular distance learning/online courses in the country.

As a result, applicants are eager to enroll in NMIMS remote learning courses in order to further their professions.

But, for those who are still undecided about whether Narsee Monjee Distance Learning will help them advance in their jobs,

This Article” Why Narsee Monjee Distance MBA is an Ideal Choice ” is brought to you by Learning Routes.

HERE ARE THE  REASONS THAT MAKE NMIMS DISTANCE MBA AN IDEAL CHOICE

Narsee Monjee University, as we all know, has been providing high-quality education in India for 35 years and has well-established centers all across the country.

The institution launched its distance learning programs under NGA-SCE after significant success in regular courses.

NMIMS Global Access School for Continuing Education (NGA-SCE) is a distance learning school developed by NMIMS University to satisfy the need for distance learning education.

Let’s have a look at some of the reasons why Narsee Monjee Distance Learning University is a good option for distance learners.

1. Awards and Accolades

The UC-DEB-AICTE has approved all of NMIMS’ distance learning courses.

Furthermore, NAAC has given NMIMS university a 5-star rating and an A grade.

The university has received numerous accolades for excellence in management studies, including top institute for distance learning for two years in a row by competition success review in 2013-14 and top institute for distance learning for two years in a row in 2014-15.

According to a DNA-leading industry survey, we are ranked 5th among the top 10 distance learning institutes.

Zee Business ranked the second-best B-schools in India in 2012.

In addition, Narsee Monjee University provides courses that are both reasonable and convenient.

Furthermore, NMIMS Global today has over 1,25,000 students and 22,500 alumni, providing India with top UGC-approved online programs.

With NMIMS Global, working professionals from over 8000 pin codes and 600+ locations across urban and rural India are advancing their careers.

2. A wide range of courses are available.

Narsee Monjee University offers a diverse choice of courses that enable students to pursue careers in their chosen fields.

Students of the NMIMS distance MBA program have a variety of specialization options from which to pick, depending on their future ambitions. If you want to be a marketing manager, for example, you can specialize in Marketing Management. Human resource management is an option if you wish to be a recruiter. If you wish to work as a retail shop manager, an MBA in retail management is a good option. These are just a handful of the specializations available, and there are many more depending on the students’ career goals.

As a result, NMIMS offers a Distance MBA program in the following specializations:

  •  Operations Management
  •  Business Management
  •  Financial Management
  •  Marketing Management
  •  Banking and Finance Management
  •  Retail Management
  •  International Trade Management
  •  Human Resource Management
  •  Supply Chain Management
  •  Information Technology and Systems Management

3. Interactive Learning Management Systems with Live Lectures

Students at NMIMS benefit from an enhanced learning experience thanks to the interactive learning management system.

E-books, case studies, and live videos are all available on the LMS.

Additionally, the LMS allows students to access study materials and notes at any time even on the go.

Most notably, NMIMS distance learning has created a platform for students to take online classes where they may engage with academics and receive support from industry experts.

4. Industry Oriented  Curriculum

The material of the courses is updated on a regular basis to reflect advancements and changes in industry standards so that students can gain industry-specific information.

In addition, the NMIMS online learning faculty includes industry professionals.

As a result, students benefit from the expertise of industry experts and can obtain direct exposure to industry standards. The numerous management programs will help you enhance your career by assisting you in upskilling and becoming the leader you desire. Our app includes both live and recorded lectures, allowing you to learn whenever and anywhere you want. There are various other features, such as a digital library and a discussion forum, that offer a worthwhile learning experience.

5. The Helpful Faculty

From a student’s perspective, the most crucial benefit of pursuing a distance MBA at NMIMS is that you get to engage with the teachers, which is impossible in other distance learning courses.

NMIMS has a diverse faculty of industry specialists. Students have the opportunity to ask questions and receive answers from industry experts, which allows them to improve their practical knowledge and abilities.

Useful Topic: Top 10 Questions Asked to NMIMS Distance MBA by Internet

6. Placement Support

For the past three decades, the University has been improving people’s lives.

During the last placement season, the average candidate package was around 16 lakhs.

The aspirant can expect enormous growth and career chances after completing a course from a university where the course content is extremely industry-specialized.

So, these are the factors that will convince you that NMIMS Distance MBA  courses are an excellent decision.
